context_of_use: This use case allows admins to create and update products to ensure the catalog and prices remain current.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control product availability and pricing
description: Allow admins to create products and update pricing so catalog and prices remain current.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and logged into the system.
postconditions: Products are created or updated in the system.
assumptions: The admin has the necessary permissions to manage products.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to create new products.
The system shall allow admins to update product prices.
main_flow: 1. Admin initiates product management → System prompts for authentication.
3. Admin selects to create a product → System prompts for product details.
4. Admin enters product details → System saves the new product.
5. Admin selects to update product prices → System prompts for product selection.
6. Admin selects a product and enters new price → System updates the product price.
